body:
# Projects

## Tapestrument
MIDI controlled Walkman using Arduino.

- [Video](https://vimeo.com/53477991)
- [Code](https://github.com/gvn/tapestrument)

## Exposure
Experimental HTML5 long exposure camera.

- [Demo](http://gvn.github.com/exposure/)
- [Code](https://github.com/gvn/exposure)

## Pris 
KVP based deep linking module. Making hashes out of hashes!

- [Code](https://github.com/gvn/pris)

# Posts

- [Building and Uploading Arduino Sketches in Sublime Text 2 (OSX)](https://gist.github.com/4197091)

# Decks

- [Building a MIDI Controlled Tapestrument](https://github.com/downloads/gvn/seattle-id/gvn-tapestrument.pdf)
- [WTF is ID?](https://github.com/downloads/gvn/seattle-id/gvn-wtf-is-id.pdf)
name: gvn.github.com
